thread.title: Jacoby Brissett wore Tom Brady's Instagram photo
thread.title_full: Jacoby Brissett wore Tom Brady's Instagram photo

author: Alysha Tsuji , USA TODAY
title: Jacoby Brissett wore Tom Brady's Instagram photo
text:
This is the "Wolf Pack."   (Photo: Tom Brady Instagram) 
The Patriots' third-string rookie quarterback Jacoby Brissett showed up at Super Bowl LI in a phenomenal custom shirt.
It's of a photo he took with fellow QBs Tom Brady and Jimmy Garoppolo, and at the bottom is says "THE WOLF PACK" - a nod to the caption Brady wrote when he posted the photo on Instagram after New England won the conference championship.
Jacoby Brissett made a shirt of a picture of he, Brady and Garoppolo from two weeks ago, via the Globe's Jim Davis pic.twitter.com/TLCVpa4mek 
â€” Ben Volin (@BenVolin) February 5, 2017 There's only one way to describe @JBrissett12 's shirt: ðŸ”¥ pic.twitter.com/7sNR3t6D9U 
â€” New England Patriots (@Patriots) February 5, 2017 Here's Brady's "wolf pack" caption:

You guys might not know this, but I consider myself a bit of a loner. I tend to think of myself as a one-man wolf pack. But when the Patriots brought Jimmy in, I knew he was one of my own. And my wolf pack - it grew by one, so where there two - there were two of us in the wolf pack. I was alone first in the pack and then Jimmy joined in later. And nine months ago, when the Patriots introduced me to Jacoby, I thought 'Wait a second, could it be?' And I knew for sure- I just added another guy to my wolf pack. So today, I make a toast! Blood brothers!

And my wolf pack - it grew by one, so where there two - there were two of us in the wolf pack. I was alone first in the pack and then Jimmy joined in later. Blood brothers!
